ja525:1.2: parissaje → pārisajje ca (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); parīsaje (pts-vp-pli1)
ja525:3.4: Tena ahaṁ → tenāhaṁ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); tenamahaṁ (pts-vp-pli1) | pabbaji → pabbajassu (bj); pabbaja (pts-vp-pli1)
ja525:4.4: kho → rājā kho (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
ja525:12.3: Yaṁ me kucchipaṭisandhiṁ → maṁ kucchimatiṁ santiṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
ja525:16.3: Kaṁ avajjhaṁ ghātemi → ghātemi km avajjhaṁ (pts-vp-pli1); taṁ avajjhaṁ ghātemi (mr)
ja525:19.1: Mātucca → mātu ca (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed) | rudantyā → rudatyā (pts-vp-pli1)
ja525:21.2: imināttho → ko nu me iminā attho (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); ko nu me nattho (pts-vp-pli1)
ja525:24.3: Taṁ te dadāmi sabbampi → taṁ deva te dadāmi sabbampi (bj); tan te dadāmi sabbaṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
ja525:30.4: Andhabālā → atha bālā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
ja525:32.2: pubbakamhi ca → pupphakamhi ca (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); pupphakamhi (pts-vp-pli1)
ja525:50.4: Rammaṁ hi → surammañhi (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr) | sudassanaṁ → sudassanaṁ nāma (bj)
ja525:51.3: Agacchittha → atha gañchittha (bj, pts-vp-pli1); atha gacchittha (sya1ed, sya2ed)
